recipesJson.name: Serially Easy Lemon Bar
recipesJson.author: SkiddlzNinja
recipesJson.description:
A lemon bar done in my Cereally Easy line of recipes. This one is not a cereal, however.

reviews.text: My first DIY bottle!  Shake and vape and it already beats the lemon bakery flavor I can't get anymore here in Indiana.  Thank you for sharing this!
